qas.question: Who was Kerry's 2nd wife's previous husband?
When did Kerry and Teresa meet?
Where did Kerry and Teresa meet?

context: Kerry and his second wife, <a1_0>Mozambican<a1_0/>-born businesswoman and philanthropist <a0_0>Maria Teresa Thierstein Simões Ferreira<a0_0/> (known as Teresa), the widow of Kerry's late Pennsylvania Republican Senate colleague <a2_0>Henry John Heinz III<a2_0/>, were introduced to each other by Heinz <a4_0>at an Earth Day rally<a4_0/> in <a3_0>1990<a3_0/>. Early the following year, Senator Heinz was killed in a plane crash near Lower Merion. Teresa has three sons from her previous marriage to Heinz, Henry John Heinz IV, André Thierstein Heinz, and Christopher Drake Heinz. Heinz and Kerry were married on May 26, 1995, in Nantucket, Massachusetts.
